sec.p: Fourty-four (81.5%) of the infected individuals showed co-infection with either Plasmodium or Haemoproteus and Leucocytozoon at the same time. Plasmodium parasitaemia was not affected by co-infection with Leucocytozoon (LRT: χ 2 = 0.09, df = 1, p = 0.759) and body mass was not significantly affected by concurrent infection with Plasmodium relictum lineage SGS1 and Leucocytozoon (LRT: χ 2 = 0.18, df = 1, p = 0.671).
